task.name: rmtables
task.shortdescription: Remove tables cleanly, use this instead of rm -rf
task.description: This task removes tables if they are not being currently accessed via the casapy process. Note: if you have multiple sessions running bad things could happen if you remove a table being accessed by another process.
task.example: Removes tables cleanly. Arguments may contain * or ?. Ranges [] are support but not ~ expansion.
